text: Yahweh Gives Rain
Ask rain from Yahweh in the season of \add the\add* spring rain—
Yahweh, who makes storm clouds,
and he gives showers of rain to them,
to everyone vegetation in the field.
Because the household gods\f + \fr 10:2 \ft Hebrew \fqa teraphim \ft  \f* speak deceit,
and those who practice divination see a lie,
and the dreamers of vanity speak in vain.
Therefore \add the people\add* wander like sheep;\f + \fr 10:2 \ft Or “flocks”; the Hebrew term refers collectively to both sheep and goats (small livestock animals) \f*
they are afflicted because there is no shepherd.
⸤My anger burns⸥\f + \fr 10:3 \ft Literally “My nose becomes hot” \f* against the shepherds,
and I will punish the leaders,\f + \fr 10:3 \ft Or “male goats” \f*
because Yahweh of hosts watches over his flock,\f + \fr 10:3 \ft Or “herd” \f*
the house of Judah;
and he will make them like his majestic horse in war.
From them\f + \fr 10:4 \ft Hebrew “him” (or “it”), referring to the flock in v. \xt 3 \ft \f* \add the\add* cornerstone will go out,
from them\f + \fr 10:4 \ft Hebrew “him” (or “it”), referring to the flock in v. \xt 3 \ft \f* \add the\add* tent peg,
from them\f + \fr 10:4 \ft Hebrew “him” (or “it”), referring to the flock in v. \xt 3 \ft \f* \add the\add* battle bow,
from them\f + \fr 10:4 \ft Hebrew “him” (or “it”), referring to the flock in v. \xt 3 \ft \f* every ruler,
\add all\add* together.
And they will be like warriors,
trampling in the mud of \add the\add* streets in the battle.
They will fight, because Yahweh \add is\add* with them,
and they will put to shame \add the\add* riders on horses.
And I will strengthen the house of Judah,
and the house of Joseph I will save.
And I will bring them back, because I have compassion on them,
and they will be as if I had not rejected them,
for I \add am\add* Yahweh their God, and I will answer them.
And \add the people of\add* Ephraim will be like \add a\add* warrior,
and their heart will be glad as \add with\add* wine.
And their children will see and rejoice;
their heart will shout in exultation in Yahweh.
I will whistle to them and gather them,
for I have redeemed them,
and they will become numerous as they have been numerous \add before\add*.
Though I sow\f + \fr 10:9 \ft Or “scatter” \f* them among the nations,
in the distant places they will remember me,
and they will stay alive with their children, and they will return.
And I will bring them back from the land of Egypt,
and from Assyria I will gather them.
To the land of Gilead and Lebanon I will bring them,
until no \add room\add* will be found for them \add there\add*.
And he\f + \fr 10:11 \ft LXX reads “they,” referring to the Israelites (so NIV, NRSV, NASB) \f* will pass through the sea of distress,
and he will strike the waves of the sea,
and all \add the\add* depths of the Nile will dry up.
The pride of Assyria will be brought low,
and the scepter of Egypt will depart.
I will make them strong in Yahweh,
and in his name they will walk,
⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 10:12 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* Yahweh.
